member.name: IUnbufferedFileHandleProvider.CloseUnbufferedFileHandle
member.summary: Closes the handle from a random-access byte stream that you created by calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUnbufferedFileHandleProvider.OpenUnbufferedFileHandle
member.summary: Gets a handle from a random-access byte stream that the StorageFile.OpenAsync method created and registers a callback method that you want to run when the opportunistic lock for the handle is broken.
member.param: An interface that contains the implementation of the method that you want to run when the opportunistic lock for the handle is broken.
The handle from the random-access byte stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUnbufferedFileHandleProvider
member.summary: Provides access to handles from a random-access byte stream that the StorageFile.OpenAsync method created.
